title: Ep 008: Wine Gadgets and Glasses - Do they make a difference?
itunes:title: Wine Gadgets and Glasses - Do they make a difference?
description:
With no shortage of wine-related gadgets, not to mention all the different shapes and sizes of wine glasses, there can be some confusion as to which products actually make a difference when enjoying wine. Elizabeth and Rick debunk some myths and share their experiences with wine gadgetry.

Show Notes:

  • Shout-outs - Some excellent emails, blog comments, and posts on the Facebook page
  • Wine News - A headache-free wine?! Could this be true?
  • Main Topic - Gadgets & Glassware (Do they make a difference?)
  • Wine Glasses - White, Red, and Sparkling Aerators & Decanters - such as the Wine Soiree Preservers - keep your wine from turning into vinegar
  • Openers - which work best?
  • Chillers - In case you don’t have a fridge in your home Wine Stain Remover - an absolute must-have!
  • Grape of the Week - Albariño (also, Alvarinho) Next Week - We tackle “terroir” (and how to pronounce it)

Sponsored by the free Hello Vino mobile app (iPhone & Android) More at the Wine for Normal People web site.
